sourcesContent:
export function invariant (fact, msg, ...rest) {
  if (!fact) {
    const error = new Error(`INVARIANT ${msg}`)
    error.stack = error.stack
      .split("
")
      .filter(d => !/at invariant/.test(d))
      .join("
")
    console.error("

---

", error, "

", ...rest, "

---

")
    throw error
  }
}
